divs: Sighting DetailsMy family and I were facing South on S 6th Street, waiting to turn West onto the South Loop. As we were waiting to turn onto the loop, I noticed two columns of bright amber lights hovering beneath two aircraft. There were approximately 4 huge amber lights in each column. Just as quickly as I had noticed the lights, they faded from the top down in less than a second or two. The aircraft continued flying in what appeared to be an Eastern direction. The lights and aircraft were midway up in the sky. I see a lot of small private planes around this area. Judging by their speed and the lights on these aircraft I would say they were small private planes. The lights faded so quickly after noticing them that my wife didn't even have a chance to see them. The lights looked like a set of stadium lights turned at a 90 degree angle, except much bigger. I would guess that the lights were as big as a quarter at arms length.
Summary: Amber Lights Briefly Iluminated Below Two Aircraft
trends: There have been 74 other sightings in Stephenville
There were no other sightings in Stephenville on or around December 15th 2009
